When I hung that piece in a public gallery, the reaction was electric. Some were outraged, of course. They saw sacrilege. But others... they saw themselves reflected in the chaos of color, in the defiance of the flowers. They saw the possibility of breaking free from the chains of the past.

It should be a wild, untamed force, free to evolve and transform, just like us.
